title: ‘Yellowjackets’ Season 2, Episode 2 Review: Feast Or Famine
description: Things get even crazier than they already are on Showtime's absolutely bonkers second season of Yellowjackets. In 'Edible Complex' they take it further than anyone expected.

title: Forget The New MacBook Pro, Apple Has Something Much Better
description: Apple's WWDC plans for a new MacBook Pro and MacBook Air will excite many, but Tim Cook and his teams have something much more impressive planned for MacOS laptops in the future.

title: Apple Watch Series 9 Will Show Notable Changes, Insider Claims
description: The hardware and software changes that are expected on the next Apple Watch are detailed by an industry insider.

title: Elon Musk Calls New York Times ‘Hypocritical’ For Selling Subscriptions But Refusing To Pay For Twitter
description: Elon Musk called the New York Times "hypocritical" on Sunday over the newspaper’s decision not to buy a Twitter Blue subscription while charging subscriptions for its own content.

title: Italy’s ChatGPT Ban, A Precedent For The Rest Of Europe?
description: On March 31, Italy became the first Western country to block advanced chatbot ChatGPT over lack of transparency in its use of data, triggering the question around Europe: Who will follow?

title: Tesla’s Quarterly EV Deliveries Jump 36%, Buoyed By Price Cuts, Federal Incentives
description: The world’s top-seller of electric vehicles had record deliveries, aided by adding new plants in Germany and Texas. Its 422,875-unit result was generally in line with analysts' expectations.

title: Elon Musk Calls New York Times ‘Propaganda’, Strips Check Mark From Twitter Account
description: The New York Times was stripped of its blue check mark on Twitter after Elon Musk called the newspaper "propaganda" on Saturday.

title: Pharmacy Benefit Managers Are Again In The Crosshairs Of Congress And The FTC: Action To Reform Drug Pricing Increasingly Likely
description: PBMs are again in the crosshairs of Congress and the FTC. This time, Congress is seeking ways to coordinate with the FTC to enact reforms. It’s becoming increasingly probable that some kind of action will be taken to create a more transparent drug pricing and rebate system.

title: Cake-Seeking Iguana Bites 3-Year-Old Girl, Leading To Mycobacterium Marinum Infection
description: This unusual case showed what can happen when you stand between an iguana and some cake.

title: The Latest Court Ruling’s Impact On H-1B Spouses And Immigration
description: A judge’s ruling puts the ability of DHS to provide work authorization to the spouses of H-1B visa holders on firmer legal grounds.

title: ‘Resident Evil 4 Remake’ Ada Wong Actress Lily Gao Harassed Off The Internet By ‘Fans’
description: This time, it’s Resident Evil 4 Remake actress Lily Gao, who played Ada Wong in the new, highly rated remake. While her performance was criticized by some, that devolved into people heading to her Instagram to personally harass her, and as such, she deleted/hid all of her posts on the platform

title: Destiny 2’s Loadouts Need These Fixes, Despite Being One Of Its Best Additions Ever
description: Here’s where I think Destiny 2's loadouts still need help. Some of this may be technical challenges Bungie has yet to overcome, but I hope they do.

title: Psychological Research Gives You 3 Tips To Protect Your Relationship From Infidelity
description: Learn to spot the signs of impending infidelity to avoid being blindsided by it.

title: ‘Ark 2’ Is Delayed And ‘Ark 1’ Is Being Killed Unless You Buy A ‘Remaster’
description: They are remastering the original Ark in Unreal Engine 5 and calling it Ark: Survival Ascended. When that game launches, they are switching off the original Ark: Survival Evolved Servers.

title: Composer And Actor Ryuichi Sakamoto Has Died At The Age Of 71
description: One of the finest composers in recent memory is arguably that of Ryuichi Sakamoto. So it is with great sadness to hear that he has died at the age of 71.

title: Ranking Succession’s Characters From Least To Most Despicable
description: Succession is back, and with it the Roy family and all the deliciously deplorable characters that make this show so addictive and wonderful. As we enter the final season, let's take a look at what makes all these characters tick and who we love to hate the most.

title: Nothing Ear (2) Review: Tremendous Sound In A Familiar Design
description: The new true wireless earbuds from Nothing have just arrived and while they’re no longer priced as entry-level, they have a lot going for them.

title: The Thrill — And The Mystery — Of A 1970s Bell Labs AI Chatbot Known As ‘Red Father’
description: In its heyday, AT&T’s Bell Labs was the center of innovation, akin to Silicon Valley today. With AI chatbots in the news, I wondered what happened to a now-vanished early version I used at the famed research institution’s New Jersey offices.

title: The New Beyerdynamic DT700 PRO X Are The Ideal Studio Headphones
description: German brand beyerdynamic has updated its image and released new headphones and microphones for home recording and professional use. The DT-700 Pro X model is affordable, well built and exceptionally comfortable for long wearing sessions.

title: Leaked Garmin Watch Offers 99-Day Battery Life
description: Rendered images of the Garmin Instinct 2X have been published online, showing off some core features.

title: Tesla Electric Semi Recalled After Just A Few Months On The Road
description: Tesla’s electric Semi trucks are being recalled over a faulty electronic parking brake, according to a notice posted online by the NHSTA. The recall comes after Tesla made its first deliveries of the highly anticipated Semi to PepsiCo and Frito Lay this past December.

title: Today’s Wordle #652 Hints, Clues And Answer For Sunday, April 2nd
description: Hints, clues and tips to help you solve today's Wordle.

title: Today’s ‘Heardle’ Answer And Clues For Sunday, April 2
description: Hints and the solution for today’s Heardle song are just ahead.

title: Today’s ‘Quordle’ Answers And Clues For Sunday, April 2
description: Hints and the solution for today’s Quordle are just ahead.
